reviewText: This is a good workout for beginners and intermediates.  It targets problem areas and enable you to effectively work the muscles in a short period of time.

reviewText: Yes, we all know that the fashions are a little dated, and the instructor walks a fine line between being encouraging and a little annoying ("Hey gang"!).  However, this remains one of my favorite and most-used exercise DVDs.  The exercises are simple and efficient, and the instruction is clear and concise.  Put the DVD in, start the program, and before you know it you are done.  This and "Perfect-in-Ten Abs" are in constant rotation for the days that I cannot make it to the gym.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I just got this dvd set and did it today. The 08 minute segments are GREAT and each dvd also has an 08 minute stretch, PLUS bonus workouts 5, 10, 15 or 20 minutes in length, segments from KHI BAE, Gilad, and a fun 10 minute Jamaican dance style workout. Love all the 08 minute segments, and bonus workouts, and the fact that it is filmed outdoors. Lots of fun!

reviewText: This dvd is truly one of the most amazing buys ever.  It not only offers a low price for so many different kinds of workouts, but it also works -- which is the best reason of all to get it.  Just like the dvd "New Sex Now", if you do exactly what they tell you to do on this dvd, you will get the results.  I have seen the various parts of my body develop and improve since I started using this workout system, and I have enjoyed the blossoming of my lovelife and intimacy with my husband since using "New Sex Now."  Go for it!

reviewText: I got this set because of the great reviews, but the Abs and Arms DVD is not a challenge at all for intermediate or advanced exercisers. I did it twice a day and felt NOTHING. The Buns DVD works ok, but it is essentially the same exercises as the Legs. Overall, probably good for beginners, but intermediate or advanced exercisers would do better off with the Firm Parts or the Abs Diet DVD.

reviewText: Many people here have already commented on how good the workouts are, and I echo them. What I really want to talk about is the value of this double DVD set. Maybe you've noticed that you can purchase the Buns & Legs, as well as Abs & Arms as separate DVDs here on Amazon. Save yourself a few bucks and get them both here! The DVDs in this set are the same as the single versions, with the same bonus workouts. A very good value here, not to mention the investment for better health.

reviewText: This DVD is the best arm and ab workout that I have ever had!

reviewText: This is a great little "no frills" workout for your arms, abs, etc. It is exactly what I wanted. No mess, no fuss. I like "pure and simple." Just plain old "let's get to work for 8 minutes." It's perfect and easy to follow. It goes by very fast and I feel rejuvenated just after that amount of time. There are plenty of minutes in the day to do a couple of these workouts and to start getting my muscles back into shape... An excellent idea !! Thanks !! I love it !!
Title: N/A

reviewText: I used this set for a couple years now as part of my morning routine.  It is great for beginners because of the variety and instructions provided.  I have been able to keep it in my routine as I have added ankle and wrist weights and a medicine ball to keep the abs/buns/legs sections challenging.I really recommend the stretch section too.  It is easy to forget how important it is to stretch in order to maintain and build strenghth!Yeah, the early 90's outfits are cheesy and the blonde man's form could be better but overall it is by far one of the best I have found!
summary: Definitely one for the KEEP pile!
Title: N/A

reviewText: This is a great work out tape.  Each workout is only 8 effective minutes long.  I especially love the ab workout and the bonus 8 min stretch.  The ab workout target each muscle in your abs (both lower and upper) and the stretch workout starts from your neck to your ankles.  Each stretch is 20 seconds long and you feel great afterwards.  The arm and leg workout are also very effective workouts.  All in all  great workout.
summary: A GREAT FULL BODY WORKOUT & STRETCH

reviewText: Okay, it might be an old fashioned dvd, but the exercise routines work even though focusing on 8 mins.I would definately recommend this dvd; I am sure you will be able to stand the theme of the workout. The other bad thing is that the quality is terrible, but who cares, when you are getting great exercise and to the point of feeling every muscle?
Title: N/A

reviewText: Just by the clothes you can tell that this workout is very dated, 1994 I think, but that takes nothing away from the workout.  The workouts really give your upper and lower body a really good workout.  The buns section is a real killer.  Talk about feeling the burn, with the buns workout you really do.  The abs and arms sections are also very challenging and with other abs and upper body workout videos (Denise Austin) my arms, shoulders, and abs get a really good workout.  I usually work on my abs, arms, and shoulders one day and then work on my abs, buns, and legs on another day. I only gave it four stars because the legs workout is not all that challenging.  If you want to get the benefits of the legs workout you will probably need to add some ankle weights to the workout, which I plan on doing.  The instructor is very encouraging and he will try to convince you that you are having fun when you are doing the workouts, yeah right.  I wanted to knock him upside his head for saying that during the buns workout.  The first time I did the buns workout and he said that I yelled at the tv that he was NUTS!!.  The only thing in the DVDs that annoyed me and probably contributed to the four stars rating is the guy in the background without a shirt on.  Could he be any more in love with himself, especially during the arms workout.  Also the instructor does not cue you to the side that mirrors him on the tv, but because I am use to that from other workout tapes and DVDs I just automatically do it out of habit.
Title: N/A

reviewText: i really love this workout i do all of them together abs, arms, buns, and legs. i feel like i have tons of energy when im done, and i really love the 8 min stretch, it feels real good, so i would recomend this for anybody but unless you dont have any helth problems at all i would recomend that you consult a doctor before doing this or any workout.
summary: a good workout for all fitness levels *^_^*
